citation.abstract: Body mass index (BMI) at its extremes contributes to morbidity and mortality in the general population. Its influence on morbidity and mortality in patients on hemodialysis is not clearly defined.
citation.title: Influence of excess weight on mortality and hospital stay in 1346 hemodialysis patients.
